import re
def solve(string):
    pattern = r"[ ,\.]" #regex pattern to match spaces, commas and dots
    replacement = ":" #replacement string
    new_string = re.sub(pattern, replacement, string) #using re.sub() to replace all occurrences
    return new_string #return the new string with replaced characters

import re

def solve(string):
    pattern = r"[ ,.]"
    replacement = ":"
    result = re.sub(pattern, replacement, string)
    return result
